website_summaries.verdict: You can get cheaper Bluetooth speakers that do the job, but the small yet versatile UE Roll has more to distinguish itself for the price -- both in terms of design and performance.
pros: The UE Roll is a compact, waterproof Bluetooth speaker with a unique design, very good sound for its size, and decent battery life
It has an integrated bungee cord and an inflatable life preserver (included if the speaker is purchased through UE's website) that allows it to float in water

customer_reviews.title: Best wearable speaker for your dollar!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two of these speakers and believe that between the quality of the sound and the fact that it doesn't swing or stick out excessively while worn that, at the under $100 price point this is the only real option if you need to wear your music. I owned my first one for nearly 3 years, i frequently smashed it into things and dropped it several times. It looked and performed like day one up until it was stolen. I will recomend and use this speaker as long as they can be found.
customer_reviews.author: ryuu28

customer_reviews.title: Decent-ish.
customer_reviews.text: Bass is pretty bad on these...and I'm not a huge bass guy, but it's very noticeably bad. Depending on the song, you can find decent bass, but it's really not a great sound. I like the idea of the pairing feature where you can link two of these up for surround sound. I have a feeling if this came out 5-7 years ago, it would've been a huge hit. These days, bluetooth speakers sound really, really good from makers like Anker; it's getting harder to compete, and this UE ROLL shows that. In the end, it's "decent", but nothing stupendous at all. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jon E.

customer_reviews.title: Is a boom
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can use it everywhere. The sound and the battery is better I havent had any problem with the sound I just want to have something to take and go and this is best in price and portability I love the brand and the sound that came from this speakers. I also convince my mother and father to purchase two more speakers so now they have their speaker all around the house. Is bad because I need to set my headphones on to not listen to them all around the house.
customer_reviews.author: JoshJnkyll

customer_reviews.title: Piece of...
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than two months. None of the buttons work. The power light never shuts off. Case is cracking along the edge. This blue one was a gift. I have a pink one and have had it for over a year and no problems. This one bought from 'The Corner Store' through Amazon is total crap. I'm wondering if I didn't get some duped item.
customer_reviews.author: c.o.

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker! I have a NYNE Bass speaker for parties at the pool, beach, and wherever else. This speaker is better for mobility reasons. While it doesnt provide a ton of bass, it can get pretty loud! I like how you can turn it on and connect just by using the app. I think all bluetooth speakers should work like this. There are also settings where you can daisy chain another UE Roll speaker to create a surround sound effect. The flap that covers the charge port and headphone jack seems inadequate but after reading reviews online I found that the ports are in fact, waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is really a unique take on a bluetooth speaker, but I love it. The sound quality is good, the charge lasts for quite a while, and it easily pairs with my Android phone. Best of all is the bungee cord that lets me hang this speaker in all sorts of places. It took me a while to realize the "design" on the front of the speaker was actually two buttons: volume up and down. I believe this speaker is also supposed to be waterproof, although I have not tested that feature yet. I feel this is a little expensive for a bluetooth speaker, but the extra features are a huge bonus over other models.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Logitech UE Roll is pretty nice sounding bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Logitech UE Roll is pretty nice sounding bluetooth speaker. I've tried several other brands and have found that Logitech UE series is consistently better sounding than most. The bass is fuller and bluetooth range is awesome. Pairing is a breeze. The only downside is that because it's a round disc shaped, you can't stand it upright by itself without leaning it against something. The bungee cord is handy, if not pretty ingenious.
customer_reviews.author: Fongpay

customer_reviews.title: Still not sure I totally love the way this looks
customer_reviews.text: Still not sure I totally love the way this looks, but I love the way it sounds and works. Perfectly portable and rugged. Get the app for even more awesome like remote turn on and block party mode where up to three devices can connect at the same time! I used it to switch between my phone music and computer playing pandora. If you are looking for a small cheaper device with great sound, get this one!
customer_reviews.author: A. Skees

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker with usable features
customer_reviews.text: Ordered used. Loud and waterproof. Used on a camping trip. Nice that I didn't have to worry about running out of battery. Works with music but not calls. Great sound for a small speaker. Feels well made and solid. UE roll app lets you and two other people (who don't have to download the app) que songs in party mode. Great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Nate the Great

customer_reviews.title: Feel confident purchasing, especially at $70 or less.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I use it paddle board fishing and kayaking and it straps right onto a milk crate. Using two together kinda sucks because I think the phone connects to one speaker then that speaker relays the signal to the other speaker. However it works, it doesn't work well in dual mode unless you have them in a fixed position within 15 feet. Solo they can reach maybe 40-50 feet and play at full blast for 8 hours! Perfect for pool parties. Not quite loud enough to host a rowdy party with 8 people talking. Best portable speaker I've seen so far. The bungee is invaluable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach pool shower
customer_reviews.text: The design gives you a great way to find the right acoustics for the occasion you would like to enjoy your sounds. It shares the same tough stuff as its cousin the Boom. At first it deems a challenge to access the USB to charge it but after a few charges you get the hang of it. I went on vacation and kicked myself for not bringing it.
customer_reviews.author: Judah Raquinio

customer_reviews.title: Withstands my clumsiness
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, durable, and LOUD! I use this for parties, socials at work, and even for some therapeutic mindfulness with my clients. Works wonders and battery last a long time! Has the capability to pair two speakers for surround sound. I own two. :))
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great speaker for the last five months. We drag it all over the house from Shower to outside it just works. It paired ease, battery life is great, the distance from player seems normal to slightly better than our previous speakers.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Best bluetooth speaker I've ever had. Have used it as a speaker when doing things around the house and for a couple parties and tailgates. Awesome sound and easy to bring anywhere. Charge lasts for a good 4-5 hours of constant playing and will play while charging after that. connecting with 2 units was easy with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: He seemed to like it. More-so when he had time to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad. He seemed to like it. More-so when he had time to play around with it. My only issue with UE brand is that battery life and blutooth range is never as good as advertised. Still, a great sounding speaker with a cool app.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is just what I was looking for. It is easy to connect and use. I love that it can be turned on and off from your phone. The sobs is awesome. The bass is so smooth. I highly recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: UE makes amazing speakers. We have two UE Booms and three ...
customer_reviews.text: UE makes amazing speakers. We have two UE Booms and three UE Rolls! They are great for biking, kayaking, showering, or just having around while doing housework - and parties! The sound is incredible, many great colors to choose from, and the price is on point. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a portable bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.author: nichme

customer_reviews.title: The only downside is that in order to get the flotation ring for this product you must order a speaker directly from UE--they wo
customer_reviews.text: Awesome--had out on kayak all day --game changer! The only downside is that in order to get the flotation ring for this product you must order a speaker directly from UE--they won't even sell the flotation device separately and it's a pretty cool thing to buy. Probably not worth the extra 40 bucks you have to pay to purchase direct.
customer_reviews.author: Pmack

customer_reviews.title: No phone answer or advance station functions
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality and pairing with bluetooth but doesn't allow answering of android phone or advance music selection like other bluetooth speakers.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: i really like UE products. i have the UE boom and use it everyday. The Roll has a nice range of volume and really does attach to most items. My is strapped to the fridge handle in the kitchen. The battery lasts for a while, probably get about 8-10 hours out of it. The only complaint is the location of the charging port. it's awkward and difficult to get the cord in there. If it didn't have the flap covering the ports, it'd be easier but i understand the protection it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This speaker sounds awesome! i took it floating on the river
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds awesome! i took it floating on the river, and it is perfect for that type of thing. We had another wireless speaker with us when camping, and we could hear this one from way farther away, and the sound is better.
customer_reviews.author: Elishema Fishman

customer_reviews.title: Love this little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Used this while volunteering at an albergue in Spain, and the music filled the public space. Sounded great used with iphone and ipad.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Best portable speaker there is. Small and compact but has great sound and very loud. Waterproof and the bungee cord is great! better than a leather strap or Velcro. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker, Horrible Recharging Design
customer_reviews.text: I bought the UE ROLL Wireless Mobile Bluetooth Speaker about three years ago. It lasted a long, long time. The sound is absolutely amazing. It has deep range and exceptional volume for a bluetooth speaker at this price point. My only complaint is that the USB cord you need to charge the UE plugs into the unit at such a strange and difficult angle. Eventually the port became bent too many times and no longer charges. Thanks for the countless hours of music and podcasts, UE Roll!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless, waterproof speaker for $100
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker! If you're looking for a super portable, excellent sounding speaker then look no further. I did lots of research and this is the best one for its price. I use it all the time (especially in the shower) and am really loving it. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Joey B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little waterproof speaker. For me (not an expert at all), the sound is just as good as the UEBoom at a smaller price. I wanted this for the beach so I cared more about rugged and waterproof and it's smaller so it fits in my beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker!! After researching and reading many reviews I bought this speaker and it is as good as everyone said it was. No issues connecting to my phone ... it survived tubing on a river ... it is very loud for speaker that size ... and it just looks cool!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel speaker. It is waterproof and being able to hang it up makes it feel super portable. I wish it could get a little bit louder, but can't complain for the size, durability, and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Law

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bluetooth speaker I have encountered and Wirecutter agrees [...]. Friends heard and bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Cyanidium

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. Only complaint I would have that I dropped a star for is how long it takes to recharge. It takes like 5 hours. I had a cheap speaker before this only that would last longer on a charge and only took like 2 hours to charge. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for price
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker sounds wonderful. Perfect for listening on porch, at beach, fishing in boat, riding around on golf cart. Seriously considering buying another just to hear them as a pair.
customer_reviews.author: rjg1994

customer_reviews.title: at the beginning i thought he might not liked it since he has a bose brand one
customer_reviews.text: Got this for fathers day for my husband, at the beginning i thought he might not liked it since he has a bose brand one. He loved it and mostly the fact that it can get wet up to 1 meter length.
customer_reviews.author: maripocha

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS MY 3RD speaker UE ROLL!!! I LOVE THE SOUND THEY ARE GREAT AND THEY HANG SO THEY AREN'T A NUISANCE ON THE TABLE. tHEY WILL PLAY TOGETHER ACTUALLY 2 OF THEM ITS GREAT!!!! SERIOUSLY THE SOUND IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: cindy buttress

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is the best speaker. Works awesome. Many of my friends have since purchased one. Love it. Had it 2 years and it's like new.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome little speaker. great sound and hangs anywhere. even on my dog's collar..
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Loving my roll! It's not quite loud enough to hear from all sides of a tennis court (set up right next to the net in the middle of the court) which I was hoping for, but is plenty loud for my backyard and sounds great! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker!  It's loud and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's loud and connects easily. Then hang string is perfect. I have a JamBox and it always vibrates off any surface that it is sitting on. The UE Roll is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: anefer

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little brothers birthday a year and a half ago and he uses it multiple times a week. Pretty great sound quality for the size and great for dance parties on the go! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this... the bungee on the back works great on attaching it to my belt..or a door know.... or a turn signal on my bike or wherever. Batter lasts a long time songs good... perfect durable personal music. This was a great buy...and I'm a cheap SOB so that saying something!!
customer_reviews.author: cyle

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to pick our new bluetooth speaker. This one did not dissapoint us. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Farinas

customer_reviews.title: Best little speakers
customer_reviews.text: I work in a kitchen and these are the coolest tools I've ever used. You can listen for a whole shift pretty much with all the equipment on and feel surrounded by sound. Only catch is you gotta buy two, but it's well worth the money. I've dropped one 6 feet onto tile before and it still works fine, I just don't think it's waterproof anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about the product. Glad my negative experience with Amazon customer service did not keep me away from completing this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Played at full volume, very little distortion. Full volume is louder than what I like but had to see if it would blow. Bluetooth range is good. Would've liked additional controls like fwd and rev and pause, but I knew it didn't have it so still rates five stars. Dropped it to the bottom of the pool then retrieved it. Shook the water out and it kept right on playing. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: MisterTom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son Christmas gift he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jasperlj

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: I can turn it on using my phone which is really cool. The alarm isn't that good but still a cool feature for a speaker to have. It's pretty loud for its size. The only cons are that there is no bass whatsoever and also no button to pause or change songs on the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: azizul hoque

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to carry around, and the elastic band is perfect for my beach umbrella or beach chair.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly E. Lugo

customer_reviews.title: ordered as gift for my son. He loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered as gift for my son. He loves it. It sounds very loud and clean. I may just order one for myself.

customer_reviews.text: Cute and we used them on the river but they kind of skip. We didn't get to listen to music the whole time.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought it refurbished... exactly what i wanted and works great

customer_reviews.title: ... product seems to work very well and have a good sound. We have a test of the waterproof ...
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work very well and have a good sound. We have a test of the waterproof feature yet.

customer_reviews.title: Power to the Roll!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for hikes and work. Same quality as my other UE, both are durable and brightly colored. Definitely would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: penguin13.haw

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker - it was easy to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker - it was easy to set up and love the fact that it is portable and water proof!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Webb

customer_reviews.title: This little speaker packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs a punch! It works very well for outdoor use. Bluetooth works solid and have had zero problems with this at the beach. Logitech made this right.
customer_reviews.author: Rozz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, fun speaker
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son. Cool app to operate speakers. Great sound. Loud. Battery lasts a long time. Need more to create surround sound mode.

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought it...lost it...buying another one!!! great speaker for the $$$!!!

customer_reviews.title: I accidently washed it in the machine!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and battery life. I'm an Air Force aircrew member and I take this thing all over the world. Have had it over a year with no issues. I never write reviews, but I accidentally washed this speaker with my laundry the other day- let it dry out for 2 day- turned it on, and it still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, but hard setup
customer_reviews.text: Once you setup the app and everything it works great and exceeds expectations. The app makes it slightly hard to setup.
customer_reviews.author: a fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific speaker, has great sound, tone and volume!!! Nice to use while working around the yard.

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker for the price. Very loud and crispy sound for it's size. Batteries are immortal. I haven't tried the waterproof feature.
customer_reviews.author: Blunt-JJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sound. Only thing missing? A next and previous track button.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sounds
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift, my nephew loves it. Has great sound for a small speaker, easy to use,

customer_reviews.title: Simply the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I'm in LOVE with this speaker! It puts out an impressive sound better than any of the other competitive or more expensive speakers out there. I use it almost every day.

customer_reviews.title: Got a dud
customer_reviews.text: Received a dud. Wont even turn on or fire up. No way to reach this company?

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only using a few times.
customer_reviews.text: Used only a few times and now it won't send out Bluetooth signal so it doesn't work. Also you can skip songs from the speaker, you must use your phone.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this for my 10 yr old nephew's birthday and he loved it. He said the sound is great. He said likes listening to it while riding his bike or walking home from school. I'm glad I found this and purchased it for him.

customer_reviews.title: Great! My 14 year old uses it in the ...

customer_reviews.text: sound, ease of use, app and quality are all great. I love this speaker, looking forward to using snowboarding and hiking! Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.text: My son owns one and recommended this to me and I really like it. Easy to use and the sound is great to me.

customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker!! Have been wanting one for a long time and very happy now that I have one. Great quality and love how mobile it is!!

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the best purchases I've made off Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best purchases I've made off Amazon. This speaker packs a TON of high quality sound and the fact that it's waterproof has made it the perfect speaker for being outdoors. Perfect for at the beach, kayaking, and days by the pool!

customer_reviews.title: this is a great little unit
customer_reviews.text: For a mono speaker, this is a great littele unit. Not cheap, but a neat accessory.

customer_reviews.text: It's hard to tell if it's on or not and whether it's charged all the way....but it does work well.

customer_reviews.text: Great price, great sound. Easy set up. You will not be disappointed.

customer_reviews.text: These things are great. If you can, buy a pair, and they'll link together for stereo sound!

customer_reviews.text: This little guy is amazing....and easy for my kids to operate. Attaches to most anything and has great sound. Haven't tried it at the beach yet so it hasn't gotten wet but it will very soon.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound quality. love the ease of use, and the bungee cord. I use this to strap it around my road by aerobars, love this speaker...

customer_reviews.title: Great except for one minor thing
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, but a bit bass heavy for spoken word
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Warriner

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd hoped for...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these - but they just don't measure up. The range isn't nearly what I expected it to be - and they don't hold a charge well. I don't want to have to plan ahead to use them and ensure they're charged - my thought is that if I charge them each time I use them, they should be ready to go for the next time. Not necessarily the case. The sound is good, and they're neat looking, and I like that I can hang them up. But, I wish I'd spent much, much less.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Take it everywhere when I travel. Good sound quality and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Moran Yang

customer_reviews.title: It's a poor design for charging
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use the charging cable bent while plugging into the unit. Now it doesn't charge? I contacted the Logitech, the manufacture, now I get to deal with returning the cable... It's a poor design for charging!
customer_reviews.author: Mwperson1

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Somewhat touchy to use. Sound is great, but turning on the dual speaker option can be trying. Otherwise, it works very good

customer_reviews.title: Disappojntjng
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bad refurb. Battery dies within a couple of hors

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a waterproof product. Wind blew the speaker into a some water and was scooped up quickly and now sound. So let it sit in the sun for 1 1/2 days and never worked again.

customer_reviews.title: So amazing! This little speaker really bumps for its size
customer_reviews.text: So amazing! This little speaker really bumps for its size. Gave it to my boyfriend for his birthday and he absolutely loves it!

customer_reviews.text: Great sound...easy to use with the app. Volume controls and the ability to attach more than one device.

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé insists on playing a soundtrack to life. On the lawn mower, in the shower, walking the dogs... Also like the usb charger because we can already have a few plugs around the house or even in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Sound great, looks awesome. The waterproof claim is totally true. Took it in the ocean, the shower, the pool. My only tiny complaint is how long it takes to charge, by the battery life is very impressive, so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Weisbrod

customer_reviews.title: Power Button Issues
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great when it works. However, I really have to push the power button hard to turn on and off. Many times it's unresponsive. Really makes it difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: lamppag

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. But what i dont like is that it take to much time for the sound to sound when you put a video on a social media. Example instagram and facebook, it take like 10 seconds to put the sound of a video sometimes even longer

customer_reviews.title: UE Roll best speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great Bluetooth speaker i have ever owned I've owned several speakers in the last 5 years this one has been the best by far
customer_reviews.author: Darrick

customer_reviews.title: Another home run!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible speaker. I also have the UE Boom but this is even more portable. While not as crisp or powerful in terms of sound, it's still more than adequate as well as being incredibly versatile. A great gift!
customer_reviews.author: parth766

product_meta.title: UE ROLL Wireless Mobile Bluetooth Speaker (Waterproof and Shockproof) - Atmosphere (2015)
product_meta.description:
Wireless Bluetooth Speaker ready for wherever. Whatever. Whenever. UE ROLL is the powerful, pint-sized speaker that brings the noise to hidden beaches, cliff jumps and mountain climbs. It's big, beautiful, unapologetically awesome sound that's small enough to take anywhere.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
646-454-3200
feature_bullets: Powerful pint-sized wireless Bluetooth speaker-small and lightweight so you can blast your music out loud everywhere
Unapologetically awesome 360-degree sound with deep bass
Waterproof (IPX7 rated) life-resistant shell designed for adventure ( Waterproof for up to 30 minutes and a depth of 1 meter)
65 ft. Bluetooth wireless range and 9 hr. battery life go as long as you can (Actual wireless range and battery life will vary with use, settings and environmental conditions)
Marine-grade bungee cord attaches to you or your bike, backpack, snorkel or whatever
UE ROLL companion app-tune it, alarm it, Double UP the sound by pairing it to another Ultimate Ears speaker
Gets awesome all the time through wireless, over-the-air speaker updates. Works with Apple and Android mobile devices
